programme.desc: We speak with Pranav Yadav, CEO of NeuroInsight, about the marketing intelligence his company is gleaning from neuroscience.

programme.desc: How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: AllStar Superman
programme.desc: Fuelled by hatred and jealousy, Lex Luthor masterminds a plot to kill the Man of Steel. Poisoned by solar radiation, Superman is dying.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After failing to catch Lamput again and again, the Docs notice that they lack something crucial in order to be successful in life, a good moustache! With their new found facial hair, the world now bends to their will!

programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings get into superfast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile oneeyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: To recover a missing package, the Bears get help from Ranger Tabes, an eccentric forest ranger. But her overblown sense of justice might be too much for the Bears to handle.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball decides to put Mr.Smalls ecofriendly principles to the test but it doesnt quite go as planned. Mr.Small disappears after deciding to leave the modern world behind. But on the plus side they discover that the Great StinkApe of Elmore Woods is definitely not extinct.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile oneeyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way fair and square !

programme.title: Interstellar Ella

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz
programme.desc: The Nome King has kidnapped Professor Wogglebug.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Findley becomes nervous when hes put in charge of taking care of House while Lucas is away.

programme.title: Jessicas Big Little World
programme.desc: Jessica finds out Craig is working on a Secret Invention and sets out to help him with it.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Barney gets frustrated when his magic misfires. The kids show Barney theyre there for him, no matter what. Through play, Barney discovers that experiencing joy lets him see and solve problems in a whole new way.

programme.title: Lady General Hua MuLan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Sour, Salty & Alive
programme.desc: The ageold practice of fermentation creates amazing delicacies using treasures of the river and sea.

programme.title: The Cuban
programme.desc: An unexpected friendship begins between an elderly Cuban musician with dementia who is brought out of his shell by his care worker, and a disillusioned young premed Afghan student named Mina. Through a shared love of music, both their lives are changed.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and ohsosoft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.desc: Hope Williams, a successful doctor, meets an accomplished artist on a girls night out. He is everything her past lovers were not, and she discovers a side of her that she never knew existed.

programme.title: The Face I Cant Forget
programme.desc: After waking from a car accident with total amnesia, Mia is taken home to be cared for by her loving husband and daughter. But as she recuperates, Mia has flashbacks of a second daughter.

programme.title: My Landlord Wants Me Dead
programme.desc: When Madeline loses her job, she turns to her Aunt Grace for help. A secluded ranch house with a cute neighbour seems too good to be true until strange events begin to occur.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2
programme.desc: Africa is a continent filled with unique and extraordinary creatures whose lives are shaped by millions of years of evolution. Africa is also the birthplace of humankind. We traveled alongside the continents animals on our own journey of evolution, yet intelligence took us on a very different path. Our curiosity led to questions about the world around us which were answered through stories, myths and legends.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2
programme.desc: Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2
programme.desc: Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animalcare team help a fleariddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Capn Turbots lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Charger has a problem... hes got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows theres always a construction solution. Rubble and the pups build Mix, Motor, Lucas, and Lily the coolest Super Squirrely Whirly playdate ever!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a minihouse for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement and a visit to her Night Tomato Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef and Olly are about to make baked apples when two apples start behaving mysteriously. Olly takes Chef camping for the first time. But when Chef tries to cook without the comforts of the Stump, he struggles with how different everything is.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Its the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a race around tropical Dragon Island! But when Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must set out to rescue his best friend and bring him back to the starting line.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Determined to surprise Charlie, Lincoln and Clyde enter a debate team competition that will take them to Tennessee.

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: Billy arrives, hopeful that his new sidekick Steve can join the TForce. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. After they reject Steves bid to join the team, he turns evil and vows revenge.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.desc: Henry, Charlotte, and Rays plans for a day of fun are derailed when Jasper accidentally triggers the emergency lockdown mode for JunkNStuff and the Man Cave, trapping everyone inside.

programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and theyre not alone... theres a monster down there with them!

programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help victims in his own way. programme.title: Inside The Boys

Sophie Jovillard discovers special effects in the Tarn. And, to end, Carine Aigon studies the recipe for flammekueche at the Moulin de la Sarre.

programme.title: UN SI GRAND SOLEIL
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: BIEN BTI
programme.desc: The Monastery of the Augustinian Sisters has been redesigned as a hotel complex focusing on harmony between the old and the new. At the Verdun Auditorium, the new arena perfectly sits side by side with the 1938 Art Deco wing and the beautiful EcoRad radiators.

programme.title: PROCHES DE DTENUS, UNE AUTRE PEINE
programme.desc: Being confronted with having a family member in prison is always difficult, particularly for children. Prisoners families, around 50,000 people in Switzerland, feel as if they are sharing the sentence and with few organisations offering support coping is even harder. Their personal stories come across as a cry for help.
